title.value: Подготовка коров к новой технологии машинного доения
Preparation of cows for new technology of machine milking
Preparation of cows for new technology of machine milking

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Presnyak, A.R., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on some aspects of formation of technology of machine milking on old dairy-commodity farms in the course of preparation of cows for transfer into new complexes. Typical lacks of linear milking machines with long milk line are considered and a number of the technological and technical actions are offered, allowing to lower action of negative factors, thereby to increase dairy efficiency and to extend term of use of cows after transition to new type of the milking machine. As effectual measures it is offered to use the new milking machine, developed by scientists of the Grodno State Agrarian University, providing elimination of some lacks of the linear milking machine with long milk line and realization of process of machine milking taking into account animal physiology.
